final_answer.precision_note: 3 significant figures based on input data.

method: Calculate equilibrium concentrations: [NO2] = 0.180 mol / 2.00 dm3 = 0.0900 mol dm-3; [N2O4] = 0.220 mol / 2.00 dm3 = 0.110 mol dm-3. Calculate Kc using the expression Kc = [NO2]^2 / [N2O4] = (0.0900)^2 / 0.110 = 0.00810 / 0.110 = 0.0736.
